BotPenguin vs uchat
Get BotPenguin: The best Uchat alternative!
Switch to an AI chatbot platform offering more seats, unlimited chatbots for all channels, and unlimited contacts. BotPenguin is designed to fulfill your business needs.
Detailed head-to-head
FREE Forever plan. No Credit Card Required.
What’s the difference between BotPenguin and Uchat?
BotPenguin’s AI chatbots are easy to create, customize and deploy. You can configure the extensive features and native integrations with a few clicks.
Pricing
BotPenguin offers a cost-effective annual plan at $50, while Uchat starts at $470 annually.
Number of Chatbots
BotPenguin allows unlimited chatbots per account, while Uchat offers only two with $10 per extra chatbot per month.
Channels
Both BotPenguin and Uchat integrate with multiple platforms, including web chat, WhatsApp, FB Messenger, and Telegram. Uchat also includes VK, Viber, WeChat, and Email.
Voice-Support
BotPenguin provides voice support through Twilio integration. Uchat has voice support for bot users, too.
Which One is the Best?
BotPenguin stands out with its user-friendly pricing and chatbot interface, making it a great Uchat alternative.

Reason to find a UChat alternative today!
Pricing: UChat’s business plan is $470 annually, with glaring limitations on adding chatbots and contacts.
Limited chatbot: UChat’s business plan offers only 2 chatbots. It charges $10 per month per chatbot.
Limited Analytics: UChat's analytics lack in-depth insights into chatbot performance and essential metrics like open rate, click rate, & unrecognized input.
Scalable But Costly: You can reach more channels, but for every channel, you need a new bot, thus increasing your bill.
Learning Curve: It’s hard to configure the chatbot features and integrations. Uchat’s UI needs some solid improvements.
Intents and entities: UChat lacks built-in intents and entities, limiting the chatbot's ability to understand user intent and extract relevant information.
Try BotPenguin
Choose BotPenguin as the best UChat alternative.
Get omnichannel access in one plan with unlimited chatbots for all available platforms.
Integrate your chatbot with 60+ native apps or any custom platform like a walk in the park—no paid add-ons.
Keep an eye on your chatbot’s performance with key metrics like open rate, click rate, unrecognized input, etc.
Manage & monitor your chatbot’s conversations and contacts through seamless Android and iOS apps.
Answer users based on keywords, intent, entities, and AI trained on your site or any data set.
Ultimately, you have better features, integrations, and UI for 10x less pricing.

Frequently Asked Questions
Is there a free alternative to UChat chatbot?
Yes, BotPenguin offers a free lifetime plan with 2000 monthly messages, one bot for any channel, AI, chatbot widget customization, train your AI chatbot on your website and FAQs, and more.
What is the pricing structure for UChat
Uchat offers an annual plan starting at $470, which may not be feasible for many small businesses. Uchat alternatives like BotPenguin charge $50 annually and are cost-effective for individuals or teams.
How many bots are included in a UChat plan?
Uchat includes 2 free chatbots, and additional chatbots cost $10 per month each. However, BotPenguin, a UChat alternative, offers unlimited chatbots to users for all platforms.
How many bot users are allowed in a UChat plan?
1000 bot users are allowed in the Uchat business plan. You can buy an extra 1000 bot users package for $5 per month (if the total extra bot users are less than 5000).
